remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法可讓您加入和移除集合中的個別控制項。The , , and methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection. 您也可以使用或方法來新增或移除集合中的所有控制項。You can also use the or methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection. 您可以判斷是否是集合的成員傳遞至控制方法。You can determine whether a is a member of the collection by passing the control into the method. 若要取得之位置的索引值在集合中，傳遞至控制方法。To get the index value of the location of a in the collection, pass the control into the method. 集合可以複製到陣列，藉由呼叫方法。The collection can be copied into an array by calling the method.
